it.uniud.mads.jlibbig.core

Interface Port<C extends Control>

  • Type Parameters:
    C - the kind of control assigned nodes exposing these ports.
    All Superinterfaces:
    LinkEntity, Owned, Point
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    Port

    public interface Port<C extends Control>
extends Point
    Ports are end-points for hyper-edges composing the link graphs and are exposed by nodes structured in the place graph composing the bigraph together with the aforementioned link graph. Despite a link graph Point, ports belong to a node and are identified by their number or position w.r.t. that node.

    • Method Summary

      int getNumber()
